metadata.label: log
metadata.description: This package provides APIs to log information when running applications.

metadata.label: printDebug
metadata.description:
Prints debug logs.
```ballerina
log:printDebug("debug message", id = 845315)
```

metadata.label: printError
printInfo
metadata.description:
Prints info logs.
```ballerina
log:printInfo("info message", id = 845315)
```

metadata.label: printWarn
metadata.description:
Prints warn logs.
```ballerina
log:printWarn("warn message", id = 845315)
```

metadata.label: setOutputFile
graphql
metadata.description: This package provides APIs for connecting and interacting with GraphQL endpoints.

metadata.label: __addError
metadata.description: Adds an error to the GraphQL response. Using this to add an error is not recommended.

metadata.label: getSdlString
metadata.description: Obtains the schema representation of a federated subgraph, expressed in the SDL format.

metadata.label: log
metadata.description:
Returns the natural logarithm of a float value.

Corresponds to IEEE log operation.

```ballerina
float f = 234.56;
f.log() ??? 5.4577114186982865
```
